task.title: How to multiply numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions for using the multiplication function of the JPS Calculation App.

prereq.p: To succussfully multiply numbers, you must know what multiplication is.

result.p: The result of the multiplication is displayed.

example.p: The equation will look like this: 9 X 6.
You enter 9. Press X. Enter 6 Press the equal sign.
The result of 54 will appear on the screen.
